comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Nope; it isn’t something we’re likely to implement either due to the technical restrictions of our backend architecture.

comments.author: Nekres.1038
comments.body:
Is there a non-cached live feed for the pvp matches a player has finished?

The default history ressource gets updated roughly ~5 minutes or so. I am asking for a real-time ressource.
